snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include Uber opening for business in Washington, Chinese electronics companies making a big push for acceptance in the...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. For Monday, selections include Uber opening for business in Washington, Chinese electronics companies making a big push for acceptance in the West and why some in Japan love an old-fashioned flip phone.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Bookless Libraries and Anti-Drone Clothing
